metadata.title: CVE-2018-0504 on Ubuntu 23.04 (lunar) - medium
metadata.description:
Mediawiki 1.31 before 1.31.1, 1.30.1, 1.29.3 and 1.27.5 contains aninformation disclosure flaw in the Special:Redirect/logid

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-0504` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

mediawiki - 1:1.31.1-2
mediawiki-classes - 1:1.31.1-2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: mediawiki package in lunar, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1:1.31.1-2').
